name: Death Upon Us
description:
Action Packed Combat
Death Upon Us features a unique combat system that allows players to adapt the game to their style of gunplay. Players can utilize different environments to take down tons of zombies, use power ups to enhance fighting, and much more. The combat system also features an intense gore system, which while doesn't overpower the scene provides an entertaining experience through dismemberment and an exaggerated physics-based combat system. Will you survive the horrid creatures?

Guns! Guns! Guns!
Death Upon Us features a large variety of weapons to use in your game, some more serious than others...

Unique Features
-Level based gameplay
-In game power ups
-Unique combat experience
-Unique zombie interaction
-Tons of guns
-And much more!
